VISION_P1.message: $company$ is a social enterprise dedicated to removing barriers for disabled design technologists by producing and sharing relevant industry expertise and personal and professional exploration via content across multiple social, hosting, and streaming platforms.
VISION_P1.description: About Section: first paragraph describing the vision of the company

VISION_P2.message: As a social enterprise, $company$ fosters positive social change by promoting and collaborating on emergent technologies aimed at increasing accessibility, inclusion, and equity for all.
VISION_P2.description: About Section: second paragraph describing the vision of the company

VISION_P3.message: $company$ is a social enterprise that aims to eliminate barriers for disabled design technologists and promote emergent technologies that improve accessibility, inclusion, and equity for all.
VISION_P3.description: About Section: second iteration describing the vision of the company

PURPOSE_HEADER.description: Purpose Section: header for section describing the purpose of the company

PURPOSE_P1.message: $AccessiTech$ believes access to technology is a human right, particularly when such technology promotes, protects, and/or facilitates other human rights.
PURPOSE_P1.description: Purpose Section: first paragraph describing the purpose of the company

PURPOSE_P2.message: Producing and publishing content on accessibility in technology, $AccessiTech$ provides clear and concise information to help disabled peoples more readily utilize the accessibility options available in their lives in order to better enable them to pursue their passions in a digital world.
PURPOSE_P2.description: Purpose Section: second paragraph describing the purpose of the company

PURPOSE_P3.message: Through the proliferation, decentralization, and democratization of technology accessibility information, $AccessiTech$ seeks to lower the barriers to entry for disabled peoples throughout design and development communities abroad.
PURPOSE_P3.description: Purpose Section: third paragraph describing the purpose of the company

PURPOSE_P4.message: Collaborating and promoting design and technology for social change, $AccessiTech$ aims to help create an increasingly accessible world for all.
PURPOSE_P4.description: Purpose Section: fourth paragraph describing the purpose of the company

REACH_OUT_HEADER.description: Footer Section: Header for section containing contact links in the footer

SERVICES_P1.message: As a design technologist with over 10 years of professional experience across multiple industries I offer independent mentorship through various platforms as I continue to produce software for digital accessibility.
SERVICES_P1.description: Services Section: first paragraph describing the services we provide

SERVICES_P2.message: As an accessibility consultant I offer a wide range of services throughout the product lifecycle, including but not limited to: Accessibility Audits, Design Research, Project Management, and Full-Stack Engineering.
SERVICES_P2.description: Services Section: second paragraph describing the services we provide

SERVICES_P3.message: As an Accessibility Consultant I audits designs and software for accessibility compliance, offer project management services, and ensure the shipping of robust and accessible software.
SERVICES_P3.description: Services Section: second iteration describing the services we provide

MENTORSHIP_P1.message: As I am able to write less and less code, I've become more and more excited to pass on my lessons learned to the next generation of designers and developers. Learning to code, I have found, is generally a very steep learning curve. While there are a plethora of resources and communities, the sheer volume of information that is already out there can be overwhelming and intimidating.
MENTORSHIP_P1.description: Mentorship Section: first paragraph describing the mentorship we provide

MENTORSHIP_P2.message: My primary role when teaching is helping students ramp up into this learning curve, dispelling myths and worries while elucidating shortcuts and gotchas, and promote their own capacity to learn. I aim to tear down the illusion of the all-knowing, all-powerful web engineer while instilling best practices of the field.
MENTORSHIP_P2.description: Mentorship Section: second paragraph describing the mentorship we provide

MENTORSHIP_P3.message: As I am able to write less code, I am excited to offer mentorship in web design and development, helping overcome the steep learning curve of coding, dispelling myths and worries, and promoting their capacity to learn while instilling best practices of the field.
MENTORSHIP_P3.description: Mentorship Section: second iteration describing the mentorship we provide

MENTORSHIP_CTA.description: Call to Action: for the mentorship section

MENTORSHIP_EMAIL_SUBJECT.description: Email Subject: for the mentorship section CTA url

CONSULTATION_EMAIL_SUBJECT.description: Email Subject: for the consultation section CTA url

CONSULTATION_P1.message: I audit new and existing design and/or software for accessibility compliance (WCAG 2.x) and best practices. I will generate a report with the results, including project-specific suggestions and resources for basic audits and implementation-specific recommendations for more advanced audits. I can also design and/or execute UX research studies to help ensure an accessible user/customer experience.
CONSULTATION_P1.description: Consultation Section: first paragraph describing the consultation we provide

CONSULTATION_P2.message: I offer project management services to support existing technical teams implementing digitally accessible products. Whether you're refactoring your site for accessibility, developing web tooling for assistive tech, or designing SDKs for disabled developers, I will help. Typically this involves scope definition, codebase analysis, product research, project work planning, and LOTS of Github issues organized via sprints and milestones. If that doesn't sound like your team, that's fine too, I'm flexible and adaptable! With a tenure of UX design and engineering behind me, I am prepared to help your team ship robust and accessible software in a safe and sane manner.
CONSULTATION_P2.description: Consultation Section: second paragraph describing the consultation we provide

CONSULTATION_P3.message: As an Accessibility Consultant I audit designs and software for accessibility compliance, offer project management services, and ensure the shipping of robust and accessible software.
CONSULTATION_P3.description: Consultation Section: second iteration describing the consultation we provide

CONSULTATION_CTA.description: Call to Action: for the consultation section button

PRODUCTION_P1.message: I believe that free, modular, and robust open-source software is quintessential for the existence of a truly accessible web for both users and developers of digital products. AccessiTech proudly produces such softwares with the intent of proliferating accessible accessibility tooling throughout todays ableist ICT communities. We must be the change we wish to see, after all!
PRODUCTION_P1.description: Production Section: first paragraph describing the production we provide

PRODUCTION_P2.message: I am a full-stack engineer with a focus on front-end development. I have experience with a wide range of technologies and frameworks, including but not limited to: React, Vue, Angular, Node, Express, MongoDB, and PostgreSQL. I am also a seasoned UX designer with a background in visual design, information architecture, and user research.
PRODUCTION_P2.description: Production Section: second paragraph describing the production we provide

PRODUCTION_P3.message: To see what I'm currently working on, check out my Current Projects section. To request a solution, ask about a product, or if interested in contributing start a Discussion on GitHub!
PRODUCTION_P3.description: Production Section: third paragraph describing the production we provide

PRODUCTION_P4.message: I believe that free, modular, and robust open-source software is crucial for creating an accessible web for both users and developers alike. $company$ proudly produces and promotes such software to counter ableism in ICT communities today.
PRODUCTION_P4.description: Production Section: second iteration describing the production we provide

PRODUCTION_CTA.description: Call to Action: for the production section button

QA_P1.message: As a QA Engineer, I have spent my career testing, triaging, and debugging software at every stage of the product life cycle, including: test planning, end-to-end quality assurance, unit/integration testing, user/usability testing, and more.
QA_P1.description: QA Section: first paragraph describing the QA we provide

QA_CTA.description: Call to Action: for the QA section button
